name: [DEMO] A Sheep's Story
description:
The story of a sheep.
A surreal stealth pacifist RPG adventure where you need to escape a prison you're in for unknown reasons.

All the work here, including all game assets, is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License by Guilherme Torres and Team Kitsune.

If you enjoy this work feel free to visit out Discord server!
